column1: Table 8. Preliminary reviews and attendance, by type of problem-solving court, 2012
Report title: Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012 NCJ 249803
Data source: Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012
Authors: Suzanne M. Strong, Ph.D., and Ramona R. Rantala, Tracey Kyckelhahn, Ph.D.
Table 8. Preliminary reviews and attendance, by type of problem-solving court, 2012
Note: Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. See appendix table 5 for standard errors. Percentages are based on 85.2% item response rate.
a/Percentages are based on 96.9% item response rate.
b/Percentages for officials attending preliminary reviews are based on less than 50% item response rate. Interpret with caution.
c/Handles alcohol- or drug-dependent offenders also charged with a driving offense.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Census of Problem-Solving Courts, 2012.
